info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 4:10PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Hamilton, central Fulton and west central Saratoga Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 410 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Caroga Lake Public Campground, or near Gloversville, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gloversville, Johnstown, Edinburg, Northville, Mayfield, Cranberry Creek, Caroga Lake Public Campground, Northampton Beach Public Campground, Caroga Lake, Sacandaga Campground, Berkshire, Bleecker, Hope, Benson, Meco, Munsonville, Tenantville, Sweets Crossing, Pinnacle and Broadalbin Junction. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
